import React from"react";import{selectIsLoggedIn,selectUserType}from"../../../slice/authSlice";import{inviteUserAsync}from"../../../slice/adminSlice";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{history}from"../../../helpers/history";import Navbar from"../../general/navbar/Navbar";import'../../../styles/shared/main.css';import'../../../styles/main/admin/invite/InviteUser.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var InviteUser=function InviteUser(){var loggedIn=useSelector(selectIsLoggedIn);var userType=useSelector(selectUserType);if(!loggedIn||userType!=='admin'){history.push("/login");window.location.reload();}var dispatch=useDispatch();// ======================================
/**
     * @function (01) prevent the default of the form behaviour
     *           (02) dispatch the user invite data - convert form data to object
     *           (03) clear the form and indicate success
     *           (04) todo reload all active links
     */var inviteUser=function inviteUser(e){//01
e.preventDefault();//02
dispatch(inviteUserAsync(Object.fromEntries(new FormData(e.target))));//03
e.currentTarget.reset();};// ======================================
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"center_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main_center_content_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main_outer_content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main_outer_heading",children:"Invite users"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main_center_content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"invite_section",onSubmit:inviteUser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"create_input_invite_admin",placeholder:"E-Mail",name:"email",type:"email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"radio_create",id:"student_radio",type:"radio",name:"user_type",value:"student",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"radio_label",htmlFor:"student_radio",children:"Student"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"radio_create",id:"coder_radio",type:"radio",name:"user_type",value:"coder",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"radio_label",htmlFor:"coder_radio",children:"Coder"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"horizontal_divider"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"create_submit_invite_admin",type:"submit",children:"Send"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main_outer_content"})]})]});};export default InviteUser;
